news.title: How to use MetaMask Buy option to put money inside your wallet
news.subtitle: MetaMask Portfolio get this Buy thing wey you fit use change your regular money (like Naira) to crypto for just a few clicks.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio get this Buy thing wey you fit use am buy crypto for easy with other people wey dey offer the service. Dem design am with you for mind, di Buy thing make everything easy and simple, you fit put money for your wallet with just few clicks.


Sellers wey dem approve


Instead make you dey limited to one person wey dey sell, MetaMask gather many different people wey dey sell wey we don check well well‚Äî to make sure them dey good‚Äîto give you the best price for your crypto wey you wan buy. To gather prices from different sources go give you plenty options to compare and select the one wey sweet you pass.

Prices wey dem fit make special for you


Everybody get different reasons why dem dey buy crypto and how them want pay. Na why we consider plenty things to give you price wey dey special for you.

  • Region: E dey available for people wey dey 189 different countries to use.
  • Way to Pay: The ways to pay go dey different depending on where you dey. Pick the way you wan pay: debit card or credit card, PayPal (U.S. except for Hawaii), Transfer money from bank, quick ACH, and oda local payment methods. More ways wey you fit pay go soon dey added.
  • Token: You fit buy over 90 different crypto things for more than 10 networks, like Ethereum, Polygon, Optimism, Arbitrum, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, and Celo, plus some more.
  • Amount: Depending on di area wey you choose and their many KYC rules, how much you fit buy at once fit get limit.

Put money for your wallet sharp sharp


Your wallet balance go update by itself for MetaMask once you don buy am finish from the provider wey you buy am. You fit send money from any exchange straight to MetaMask now, no more waiting.

We dey welcome users wey just join from all over the world


Web3 dey everywhere, and we suppose welcome people to crypto like dat too. Since dem launch de aggregator, MetaMask dey try partner with people all over de world to help anyone, ‚Äîno matter where you dey‚Äî to enter web3.

We want this thing to be the perfect place for new people wey just dey come into web3 so dem fit start to do oda important things.

How to use di Buy feature for MetaMask Portfolio


To put money for ya wallet:

  1. Link ya MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Click di ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù tab to start am
  3. Pick ya area
  4. Pick how you wan pay
  5. Pick di coin and network wey you wan buy from (For example: ETH for Ethereum network)
  6. Put the amount you want in regular money (for example: $100 worth of ETH)
  7. All the prices from all the different people wey dey sell go show and pick one to move on.
  8. Dem go redirect you to their website, safe and sound, to finish de payment, and de funds go dey added for your MetaMask wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

For MetaMask Portfolio, the "Buy" thing wey dey there go allow you pump your wallet with any crypto wey you want, and you fit start to use am straight away. Whether you wan hold your ETH for profit, buy NFTs (special digital things you fit get), try out DeFi (decentralized finance), or even more things ‚Äî you fit do all these things now with account wey get money inside.

Shey you don dey ready to enter? Sabi plenti for metamask.io/portfolio/.

MetaMask Portfolio: Carry eye see and watch over all your web3 kain kain things

MetaMask Portfolio na ogbonge platform wey dey easy to use and get all your web3 things for one place, e go help you control everything yourself. Whether you wan use Dashboard, Buy, Swap, Bridge, Stake, you dey safe. We dey always work hard to make the dapp better and better with updates wey go make sense. Press here to sabi more about MetaMask Portfolio and wetin e fit do.

news.metaDescription: Use this guide to sabi how to buy crypto for MetaMask Portfolio from the very beginning reach the end.

nodes.title: Way to sell crypto collect cash with MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask Portfolio get this Sell thing wey dey allow you sell your crypto and get money from people wey MetaMask don check well well, with just small clicks.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio get this Sell thing wey allow you to change your crypto to regular money (like Dollar, Euro, and Pound) with no stress. Combined with di Buy function, e fit make you be your own boss for web3 experience with less middlemen and quick conversion to normal money straight to where you wan am, like your bank account or PayPal balance if e dey available


Crypto sellers wey dem approve


Instead to limit to one provider, MetaMask gather many providers wey dey trusted (many of dem dey de same ones for de [Buy] (http://portfolio.metamask.io/buy?utm_source=metamask&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=feature-articles_content) flow)‚Äîmake sure dem meet our high standards‚Äîto show you different options wey dey available in real-time to change your ETH on Ethereum Mainnet to de normal money wey you choose (where dem dey available).

People from all over de world


You fit sell things now for the US (but some states get their own rules), UK, and some places for Europe, but dem get plan to extend am to more places to help our people all over di world. Na important thing for people to fit freely buy and sell crypto, and we hope say these ways go make web3 reach plenty more people. We dey start with support for ETH for Ethereum Mainnet, but soon, we go fit get even more kain kain tokens wey them dey use for gas for those levels wey dey on top of the main network (layer 2), and even normal money like US Dollar (USD), Euro (EUR), and British Pound (GBP).

How to use di Sell Crypto feature for MetaMask Portfolio:


To sell ya crypto for money:

  1. Connect ya MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Press di ‚ÄúSell‚Äù tab to start am
  3. Pick ya area
  4. Pick di crypto and network wey you wan sell from (For example: ETH for Ethereum network)
  5. Pick the account wey you wan make your money enter for your area (for example: bank account or PayPal account wey you get money for inside)
  6. Put the amount of crypto wey you wan sell (example: 0.5 ETH)
  7. All the prices from all the different people wey dey sell go show right now. Pick one make you kontinu.
  8. Dem go send you safely go the website of the person wey dey sell to register and connect your regular money account, then send you back go MetaMask Portfolio.
  9. Pick "Send ETH to [Provider]" to move your crypto from your wallet to your bank account.
  10. Confam di transaction for ya MetaMask wallet.
  11. You go fit monitor your order as e dey process for di "Sell" place. Each person wey dey sell get their own time, and your money fit take some days to show for your normal bank account.

Success! ü¶ä

E dey aligned with oga/madam wey dey sell am


With the Buy and Sell ting for your MetaMask Portfolio, you fit buy and sell your crypto and cash with many of the same people wey you don know already. E mean say you go only need to sign-up and connect your bank account one time with one particular oga/madam wey dey sell. We hope say you go like to dey use dis features.

Shey you don dey ready to enter? Sabi plenti for metamask.io/portfolio/.

MetaMask Portfolio: Carry eye see and watch over all your web3 kain kain things

MetaMask Portfolio na ogbonge platform wey dey easy to use and get all your web3 things for one place, e go help you control everything yourself. Through Dashboard, Buy, Swap, Bridge, Stake, you dey safe. We dey always work hard to make the dapp better and better with updates wey go make sense. Press here to sabi more about MetaMask Portfolio and wetin e fit do.

nodes.title: Transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available in MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

image.title: Centralized exchange transfers MetaMask now available
image.description: Centralized exchange transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available on MetaMask.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio now supports centralized exchange (CEX) transfers from Coinbase and Binance, streamlining the process of transferring assets to your crypto wallet.

Many web3 users have digital assets divided across multiple wallets and accounts, creating a fragmented experience. Moving assets from one platform to another can be overly complicated and involve many steps‚Äîfraught with the risks of copying and pasting addresses incorrectly, and potential security concerns. MetaMask‚Äôs new CEX transfer feature is a solution to this issue, making your wallet more powerful, while also strengthening security.

Instant transfer of assets from centralized exchanges into your MetaMask wallet

MetaMask CEX transfers allow you to immediately move assets between accounts, eliminating the need for manually entering addresses. And, if you have bank accounts linked to your Coinbase or Binance accounts, purchasing crypto directly with your bank account to your MetaMask wallet has never been easier. No additional KYC necessary.

In April 2024, MetaMask partnered with Meld and Mesh to launch a feature that allowed users to track external CEX balances by linking Coinbase or Binance accounts directly from the MetaMask Portfolio dashboard. Now, you can view CEX balances, and also transfer assets from these exchanges into your MetaMask wallet. Neither MetaMask, nor our partners in this integration, will ever have access to your exchange login credentials, or share your wallet addresses with third parties.

CEX transfers will initially support Coinbase or Binance accounts, with expansion to additional exchanges on the horizon. No fees will be charged when transferring digital assets from exchanges to MetaMask. A nominal transaction fee of 0.25% will be applied when transferring from MetaMask to centralized exchanges. Network gas fees also apply.

By bridging the gap between self-custodial and centralized platforms, MetaMask is paving the way for a more powerful, integrated, and user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Head to MetaMask Portfolio today to get started with CEX transfers.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

nodes.title: How gamers are empowered in web3
nodes.subtitle: Discover the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo
image.description: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo gaming

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. For Yooldo ‚Äì a gaming community focused on security and autonomy ‚Äì¬†MetaMask is essential.

A new era of web3 gaming

In traditional online gaming, players' assets are controlled by the developer or publisher, and stored on centralized servers. This setup leaves users at risk of losing access to their digital items, which can happen for various reasons including a company modifying its policies, or shutting down the game. In web3 gaming, players have full ownership of their digital assets, independent of the game itself. This decentralization ensures that Yooldo gamers have complete control over their assets, with no monolithic authority able to restrict access or manipulate users‚Äô holdings.

How MetaMask keeps gaming assets safe

With self-custody comes gamers' responsibility for maintaining safety of their own assets. The decentralized security that MetaMask offers is vital for Yooldo gamers. Users have control over their private keys, which means that even in the case of a data breach, gaming assets will remain secure. All actions on Yooldo are also transparent and traceable ‚Äì whether purchasing an in-game asset, or interacting with the platform. And, each transaction requires user approval, via blockchain‚Äôs cryptographic validation and consensus protocols.

Another critical feature that safeguards users is phishing protection, powered by MetaMask and ChainPatrol‚Äôs Eth-Phishing-Protect. MetaMask provides in-app warnings, and domain verification systems to protect users from dubious links and attacks. This allows Yooldo gamers to be alerted to potentially malicious websites quickly and efficiently.

Empowering gamers through decentralization

As the web3 ecosystem grows, security is of the utmost importance. Gamers can store, buy, sell, and trade their in-game assets directly, without worrying about data breaches, server failures, or third-party interference. More broadly, MetaMask enables players to transfer assets between different games, or wider marketplaces. Digital gaming assets earned in Yooldo can be sold or traded for tokens with real-world value, extending their utility beyond gameplay. No matter where you are in your web3 gaming journey, MetaMask continues to offer more ways to stay secure.

Ready to dive into web3 gaming? Head to Yooldo to get started.
